prefixDef.p: In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "db" prefix point to the project's APIS instance, a database system to collect information of entities.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "per" prefix point to the BDRC's data interface's person module.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "zot" prefix point to a record in the projects's Zotero group.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "corpusmd" prefix point to any element in the corpus TEI document via its ID.

body.ab: g+hu ru sta ba | bod skad du | bla ma la bstod pa |

ab.l: thugs sbyangs stobs kyis smra ba'i seng ger grags ||
nyi zla bzhin du ma rig nyon mongs sel ||
bsdu' bzhis bdag sogs 'gon med smin grol mdzad ||
zung 'jug mtshan don ldan pa khyed la 'dud ||
chos kyis 'phongs pa'i sems can la ||
rgyas 'bring rtogs pas tshim mdzad pa ||
de bzhin bdag gis sems can rnams ||
'phrin las rnaMs kyis tshim byed shog ||
bla ma bde' bar gshegs pa'i gsung zab cing rgya che ba thugs su chud nas gzhan la ston pas 'khor ba'i mun nag du 'khyaMs pa'i long khrid pa ||
dbu' ma chen pos gdul bya mngon mtho' nges legs la 'god pas thar pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i skyed byed ||

body.ab:
shag kya'i dge' slong gzhon
nu byang chub la bstod pa || rdzogs s+hy+o ||

@||
lnga brgya pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa rtog ge ba rnams kyi spyi gtsug gi rgyan |
bde' bar gshegs pa'i bka' rab 'byams dri ma med pa'i gsal byed |
rmongs pa rnams kyi long khrid pa bla ma rnams kyi gsung gi rtogs pa'i myu gus rgyud brlan pa |
mtshan thos pa tsam gyis 'gro ba skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi don mdzad spyod pa |
dpag du med pa'i don 'byung pa'i gzhi rgyal ba skyed par byed pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo rgyas 'bring gsum rtogs pa'i shes rab thun mong ma yin pa dang ldan pa'i bla mas |
dad pas rta la brtson 'grus
kyi lcag gis bskyod pa'i chos brgyad spangs pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gnang ba'i dus su |
gus pa dang dad pas gzhi bzung brtson 'grus dang shes rab kyis khyad par can gyi don la phyogs pa'i |
shag kya'i dge slong gzhon nu byang chub kyis legs par mnyan pas |
tshig dang don gyi rtogs pa phyin ci ma log pa mnyam pa med pa thob pa'i dge ba des skye bo kun yum la mos pa dang bdag nyid kyi rtogs pa brtan par 'byung par shog ||
